90 public:

94 
96  enum Format {
97  kJson,
98  kBinary // Load directly into memory

100

109  Loadable() {}
110  virtual ~Loadable() {}
112 
113  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
116 
118  const GString& getPath() const { return m_path; }

156 class DistributedLoadable : public Loadable {
157 public:
158  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
161 
163 
164  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
167  DistributedLoadable(const GString& filepath): Loadable(filepath){
168  }
169  DistributedLoadable() {
170  }
171  virtual ~DistributedLoadable() {}
173 
174  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
177 
178  std::vector<GString>& additionalPaths() { return m_additionalPaths; }
179 
181  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
184 
186  virtual QJsonValue asJson(const SerializationContext& context = SerializationContext::Empty()) const override {
187  QJsonObject object = Loadable::asJson().toObject();
188 
189  if (m_additionalPaths.size()) {
190  QJsonArray paths;
191  for (const GString& path : m_additionalPaths) {
192  paths.push_back(path.c_str());
193  }
194  object.insert("additionalPaths", paths);
195  }
196 
197  return object;
198  }
199 
201  virtual void loadFromJson(const QJsonValue& json, const SerializationContext& context = SerializationContext::Empty()) override;
202 
204 protected:
205  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
208 
209 
211 
212  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
215 
217  std::vector<GString> m_additionalPaths;
218 
220 
221 };
222

225 } // End namespaces
